Shr 1.59 dlrs vs 54 cts Net 43.3 mln vs 13.9 mln Revs 566.7 mln vs 487.8 mln Avg shrs 27.2 mln vs 25.9 mln NOTE: 1986 figures restated for adoption of financial accounting standards board statement 87 "employer's accounting for pensions."
